page.syntax: C a5_dictionary_write(C dictionary ,C type ,C name ,* contents [,L flagRefreshControlPanel ])

argument.name: dictionary
argument.description: The name of a dictionary file containing a toolbar. Character

argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of the toolbar object. Character

page.description: Writes a record to a data ditionary.
page.discussion: The A5_DICTIONARY_WRITE() writes the Xbasic code associated with a toolbar into a dictionary file.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following script reads the contents of a toolbar named mainmenu into a character variable.
The following script writes the new code ( newtb ) for a toolbar named mainmenu into the dictionary file Alphasports.Alb.
